stp_details.scheme_name: ITI ARBITRAGE FUND DIRECT PLAN GROWTH

swp_details.scheme_name: ITI ARBITRAGE FUND DIRECT PLAN GROWTH

meta_title: ITI Arbitrage Fund Direct   Growth - Groww
meta_desc: ITI Arbitrage Fund Direct   Growth is Arbitrage Hybrid mutual fund with risk-reward rating of 1/10. It has track record of 5 years, with three year return of 5.71. Risk is Moderately Low
exit_load: Exit load of 0.25%, if redeemed within 30 days.
description: The scheme seeks to generate income by predominantly investing in arbitrage opportunities in the cash and the derivative segments of the equity markets and the arbitrage opportunities available within the derivative segment and by investing the balance in debt and money market instruments.

analysis.analysis_desc: 3Y and 5Y annualised returns lower than category average

Average credit rating of the fund's holdings: AAA 
This fund has holdings of the highest quality
1Y annualised returns higher than category average by 0.76%

Higher alpha: 1.97 
The fund has generated returns higher than benchmark - NIFTY 50 Arbitrage Total Return Index - in the last 3Y

amc_info.name: ITI Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: ITI Asset Mangement Limited,ITI House, Building no. 36,Dr. R. K. Shirodkar Marg, Parel, Mumbai 400012

category_info.category_helper_text: Invests in stocks as per Contrarian investment strategy
category_info.tax_impact: If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.
category_info.description: Contra funds follow Contrarian strategy which means investing in stocks in contrast to the prevailing sentiment. Minimum investment in equity is 65%.
